title: Looking to start a proper La Trobe University team for tournaments
body:
Hi,

My name is Munkle and I attend La Trobe University.

I'm hoping to create a proper and competitive LTU team for the university leagues, or even for local/small tournaments.

My previous experience with 5v5s:

Last season I tried to start an LTU team, and we won a few tournaments, but we ended up disbanding.

Season 3: Diamond 
Season 4: Challenger I
Season 5: Challenger I



My mains:  {{champion:59}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:102}} {{champion:421}} 

Please respond here, or add me in game if you're from La Trobe university and want to join the team.

Cheers.

replies.body: Well, i go to la trobe but i'm unranked.. would very much love to play on uni championships though.
I go to Latrobe but I'm only Silver 3. Good luck with the team!

my older brother goes to la trobe but he is bronze 3 i believe his user is
You Mad Or Gnar add him he might be interested
